parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sides </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks whether the unit is a [[captive]]. If the unit is a vehicle, its commander is checked instead.<br>
If a unit's captivity level was set as a [[Boolean]], then the returned number is either 0 (for [[false]]) or 1 (for [[true]]). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[captiveNum]] unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - anything from 0 to value set by [[setCaptive]] alt syntax. A non zero value means [[captive]]. </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_captivity = [[captiveNum]] _unit;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[setCaptive]] 1024;
[[hint]] [[str]] [[captive]] _unit; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true</value></part></template>
[[hint]] [[str]] [[captiveNum]] _unit; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>1024</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[captive]], [[setCaptive]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>
